titles.title: I'll Not Let You Go, Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I'll not let You go, Lord.
I'll not let You go.
Except that You change me,
Lord, I'll not let You go.
(Repeat.)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Change me, O God.
Take the weakness in my life
And make it strength
For Your glory.
I'll not let You go.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Make haste to me, O God.
I'll not let You go.
Come forth in my Lord,
And I'll not let You go.
